name: Chaotic Garden
description:
You are playing as Bobby the farmer in a dangerous and strange looking new world. Bobby and some dangerous enemies from his Book World are now stucked in a strange dream world. 
The only way for Bobby to get back to his world is, by killing all his enemies. But how? Bobby is not a fighter.....

It's good that Bobby has his Seedbag with him, so he can use his plants to fight the enemies. But be aware, the weather has a huge impact on your plants. Don't waste them, because you don't have unlimited seeds!

Can you help Bobby? Controls Function Keyboard/Mouse Gamepad Movement W-A-S-D Left Joystick Plant seed Right Mouse Button North ButtonChange seed Mouse Scroll Wheel front West Button
Weather change E East Button  pause menu Esc Start Button  Interaction QPress Right Stick Credits Name  Profile link Occupation LUKA TISLJARIC https://euka-programming.itch.io/
